CustomField.formula: or(text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Account Manager' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Senior Account Manager' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'ISAM' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Key Account Manager' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Key Account Support' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Sales Director' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Sales Manager' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Sales Representative' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Sales Support' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Senior Account Manager' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Technical Sales Expert' ,text(Sales_Person_Type__c)= 'Technical Sales Manager' )
CustomField.label: isSalesPerson
